price: 84. Dheh: Mid walbaa wuxuu u dhaqmaa hadba siday tahay asluubtiisa, Rabbigiin baana aad u ogsoon kan isagu si fiican ugu hanuunsan jidka (Toosan ee Islaamka).
arabic: قُلۡ كُلّٞ يَعۡمَلُ عَلَىٰ شَاكِلَتِهِۦ فَرَبُّكُمۡ أَعۡلَمُ بِمَنۡ هُوَ أَهۡدَىٰ سَبِيلٗا

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: qul kullun yaʿmalu ʿalā shākilatihi farabbukum aʿlamu biman huwa ahdā sabīlan
